title: What fixes did Android 11 December 2020 bring on Pixel 2 devices?
content: My Pixel 2 has been subjected to a lot of problems since i updated to android 11, Battery drainage, not going full screen in games, randomly shutting down,app bugs and what not....I was satisfied with Google services till Android 10 and now...i hope they have solved these issues and haven't lost a google fan.
